Class
Description
Command
Represents an abstract command.
ExecutionError
That exception is thrown when command execution failed
Misc
Miscellaneous validators.
Misc.GreaterValidator<I extends Comparable<I>>
Validate that object greater than other
Misc.LowerValidator<I extends Comparable<I>>
Validate that object lower than other
Misc.NotNullValidator<I>
Validate that object is not null and return same value.
Misc.OrNullValidator<I,O>
Wrap validator and return null if ValidationError was ocurred.
OutputChannel
Used for passing messages from command to an external source.
Requirement<I,O>
A requirement encapsulates one Command parameter and its validation.
RequirementAskError
/** Occurs when RequirementPipeline cannot correctly ask requirement, for example due to many attempts in CLI.
RequirementsPipeline
This class is used for supplying requirement values to command from an external source.
StringValidators
String validators.
TextResources
This class holds all the text resources used in the application, organized into different nested classes for easier access.

ValidationError
Thrown by Validator when cannot convert taken value to target type.
Validator<I,O>
Functional interface for validation and converting requirements values.

Internal class that helps aggregate two validators in one.
